mapper.select: SELECT a.productname, b.productid, b.t6_8, b.t8_10, b.t10_12, b.t12_14, b.t14_16, b.t16_18 FROM products a JOIN ( SELECT productid, NVL(SUM(t6_8), 0) AS t6_8, NVL(SUM(t8_10), 0) AS t8_10, NVL(SUM(t10_12), 0) AS t10_12, NVL(SUM(t12_14), 0) AS t12_14, NVL(SUM(t14_16), 0) AS t14_16, NVL(SUM(t16_18), 0) AS t16_18 FROM ( SELECT productid, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 06:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t6_8, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 10:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t8_10, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 10:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 12:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t10_12, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 12:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 14:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t12_14, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 14:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 16:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t14_16, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 16:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 18:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t16_18 FROM performances ) temp GROUP BY productid ) b ON a.productid = b.productid

SELECT a.productname, b.productid, b.t6_8, b.t8_10, b.t10_12, b.t12_14, b.t14_16, b.t16_18 FROM products a JOIN ( SELECT productid, NVL(SUM(t6_8), 0) AS t6_8, NVL(SUM(t8_10), 0) AS t8_10, NVL(SUM(t10_12), 0) AS t10_12, NVL(SUM(t12_14), 0) AS t12_14, NVL(SUM(t14_16), 0) AS t14_16, NVL(SUM(t16_18), 0) AS t16_18 FROM ( SELECT productid, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 06:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t6_8, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 10:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t8_10, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 10:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 12:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t10_12, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 12:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 14:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t12_14, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 14:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 16:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t14_16, CASE WHEN reporttime BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 16:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 18:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN productioncount END AS t16_18 FROM performances ) temp GROUP BY productid ) b ON a.productid = b.productid WHERE (a.productname = #{productname} OR #{productname} IS NULL)

SELECT p.productname, SUM(CASE WHEN TRUNC(r.reportdate) BETWEEN TO_DATE('2025-02-03', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2025-02-09', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN r.productioncount ELSE 0 END) AS week1, SUM(CASE WHEN TRUNC(r.reportdate) BETWEEN TO_DATE('2025-02-10', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2025-02-16', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN r.productioncount ELSE 0 END) AS week2, SUM(CASE WHEN TRUNC(r.reportdate) BETWEEN TO_DATE('2025-02-17', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2025-02-23', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN r.productioncount ELSE 0 END) AS week3, SUM(CASE WHEN TRUNC(r.reportdate) BETWEEN TO_DATE('2025-02-24', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2025-03-02', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN r.productioncount ELSE 0 END) AS week4 FROM performances r JOIN products p ON r.productid = p.productid WHERE r.reportdate BETWEEN TO_DATE('2025-02-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2025-02-29', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY p.productname ORDER BY p.productname;
